examples.example: 我小心翼翼地保管着我的银行卡，它为我的生活带来了很多便利。

translate.english: I carefully keep my bank card, which brings a lot of convenience to my life.

examples.example: 我把工资存进银行卡里，看着数字一点点增长，心里充满了成就感。

translate.english: I deposit my salary into the bank card, looking at the numbers increasing little by little, and my heart is filled with a sense of accomplishment.

examples.example: 每次出门我都会带上银行卡，它让我购物时方便又安心。

translate.english: Every time I go out, I will bring the bank card with me, which makes it convenient and reassuring for me when shopping.
